3388  tetraphilia_assert( active->curXBandBot >= active->curXBandTop );
3389  else if ( edge->deltaXSign < 0 )
3390  tetraphilia_assert( active->curXBandBot <= active->curXBandTop );
3391  else if ( edge->deltaXSign == 0 )
3392  tetraphilia_assert( active->curXBandBot == active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandBot == get_x(edge->top()) );
3393  }
3394  }
3395  }
3396  #endif
3397 
3398  if ( stage == 0 ) {
3399  // Prescan band for intersections and preflight for second stage processing.
3400 
3401  // Definition: Let the word "barrier" denote any edge which doesn't
3402  // intersect any of the edges TO ITS LEFT (inside the current band).
3403  //
3404  // We make use of the fact that if an edge to the right of a barrier
3405  // does not intersect the barrier, then it does not intersect any of
3406  // the edges to the left of the barrier.
3407  int initialLeftEdgeCount = -1;
3408  int numIntersectionsFoundInsideCurrentBand = 0;
3409  for ( int rightEdgeCount = 0; rightEdgeCount <= m_highestActiveEdgeIndex; ++rightEdgeCount ) {
3410  edge_type* rightEdge = m_edgeSorts[rightEdgeCount];
3411  if ( rightEdge ) {
3412  active_edge_type *rightActive = rightEdge->activeData;
3413  // Check for intersections between rightEdge and edges to its left
3414  real_type rightMin = t4::min<real_type>(rightActive->curXBandTop, rightActive->curXBandBot);
3415  int numIntersectionsBetweenRightEdgeAndEdgesToItsLeft = 0;
3416  for ( int leftEdgeCount = initialLeftEdgeCount; leftEdgeCount >= 0; --leftEdgeCount ) {
3417  edge_type* leftEdge = m_edgeSorts[leftEdgeCount];
3418  if ( leftEdge ) {
3419  active_edge_type *leftActive = leftEdge->activeData;
3420 
3421  ReducerYield( 200 );
3422 
3423  //tetraphilia_assert( leftActive->curXBandTop <= rightActive->curXBandTop ); // Currently, it can happen that the edges can be out of order here
3424  real_type leftMax = t4::max<real_type>(leftActive->curXBandTop, leftActive->curXBandBot);
3425  int numIntersectionsBetweenLeftAndRightEdge;
3426  if ( leftMax > rightMin ) {
3427 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
3428  int numLines = (leftActive->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine ? 1 : 0) + (rightActive->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine ? 1 : 0);
3429  if ( numLines == 2 )
3430 #endif
3431  {
3432  // 2 lines
3433  if ( leftActive->curXBandBot > rightActive->curXBandBot ) {
3434  // intersection between lines must exist in band
3435  real_type leftDeltaX = leftActive->curXBandBot - leftActive->curXBandTop;
3436  real_type rightDeltaX = rightActive->curXBandBot - rightActive->curXBandTop;
3437  real_type deltaDeltaX = leftDeltaX - rightDeltaX;
3438  real_type t;
3439  real_type deltaTop = rightActive->curXBandTop - leftActive->curXBandTop;
3440  if ( !real_services::DivWillOverflow( deltaTop, deltaDeltaX ) ) {
3441  t = deltaTop / deltaDeltaX; // specialized formula for intersecting line segements with same starting and ending y values
3442  // constrain t between 0 and 1
3443  if ( t < 0 )
3444  t = 0;
3445  else if ( t > 1 )
3446  t = 1;
3447  }
3448  else
3449  t = real_type(0.5);
3450 
3451  real_type x, y2;
3452  if ( t == 1 ) {
3453  x = leftActive->curXBandBot;
3454  y2 = yBandMax;
3455  } else {
3456  if ( AbsVal( rightDeltaX ) < AbsVal( leftDeltaX ) )
3457  x = rightActive->curXBandTop + rightDeltaX * t;
3458  else
3459  x = leftActive->curXBandTop + leftDeltaX * t;
3460  y2 = yBandMin + (yBandMax - yBandMin) * t;
3461  }
3462  tetraphilia_assert( yBandMin <= y2 && y2 <= yBandMax );
3463 // tetraphilia_assert( (leftActive->curXBandTop <= x && x <= leftActive->curXBandBot) ||
3464 // (leftActive->curXBandBot <= x && x <= leftActive->curXBandTop) );
3465 
3466  AddIntersection(
3467 #ifdef RECORD_INTERSECTION_X_VALUES
3468  x,
3469 #endif
3470  y2, leftEdge, 0, rightEdge, 0, yBandMin
3471  );
3472  numIntersectionsBetweenLeftAndRightEdge = 1;
3473  }
3474  else
3475  numIntersectionsBetweenLeftAndRightEdge = 0;
3476  }
3477 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
3478  else {
3479  // At least one of the egdes is not a line
3480  numIntersectionsBetweenLeftAndRightEdge = ComputeIntersectionInvolvingAtLeastOneCurve( leftEdge, rightEdge, yBandMin, yBandMax );
3481  }
3482 #endif
3483  numIntersectionsBetweenRightEdgeAndEdgesToItsLeft += numIntersectionsBetweenLeftAndRightEdge;
3484  }
3485  else
3486  numIntersectionsBetweenLeftAndRightEdge = 0;
3487 
3488 
3489  if ( numIntersectionsBetweenLeftAndRightEdge == 0 && leftActive->isBarrier )
3490  break;
3491  }
3492  }
3493 
3494  rightActive->isBarrier = ( numIntersectionsBetweenRightEdgeAndEdgesToItsLeft == 0 );
3495  initialLeftEdgeCount = rightEdgeCount;
3496  numIntersectionsFoundInsideCurrentBand += numIntersectionsBetweenRightEdgeAndEdgesToItsLeft;
3497  }
3498  } // for (int rightEdgeCount = 0; ...
3499 
3500  // sort latest intersection records by y values (all those before m_curEdgeIntersection should already be sorted and should all be less than the new records)
3501  if ( numIntersectionsFoundInsideCurrentBand )
3502  std::sort( m_curEdgeIntersection, m_curEdgeIntersection + ( m_numIntersectionRecords - static_cast<size_t>( m_curEdgeIntersectionIndex ) ),
3503  edge_intersection_change_type::compareIntersectionChanges );
3504 
3505  // assert that entire intersection buffer is correctly sorted
3506  #ifndef NDEBUG
3507  {
3508  size_t k;
3509  for (k = 1; k < m_numIntersectionRecords; ++k)
3510  if ( edge_intersection_change_type::compareIntersectionChanges( m_edge_intersection_buffer[k], m_edge_intersection_buffer[k-1] ) )
3511  break;
3512  tetraphilia_assert( k == m_numIntersectionRecords );
3513  }
3514  #endif
3515 
3516  // assert that there is a terminator as expected at the end
3517  tetraphilia_assert( m_edge_intersection_buffer[m_numIntersectionRecords-1].m_yVal == limits<real_type>::max() );
3518 
3519  // process all intersections we just found if this is not the last band
3520  if ( yBandMax != yScanLineEnd ) {
3521  while ( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_yVal <= yBandMax )
3522  ProcessNextEdgeIntersectionChange();
3523  tetraphilia_assert( static_cast<size_t>(m_curEdgeIntersectionIndex) == m_numIntersectionRecords - 1 );
3524  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection == &m_edge_intersection_buffer[m_curEdgeIntersectionIndex] );
3525  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_yVal == limits<real_type>::max() );
3526 
3527  #ifndef NDEBUG
3528  // loop over the band bottoms once for each band and assert they are in order
3529  real_type prevBot = limits<real_type>::min();
3530  for ( int edgeCount = 0; edgeCount <= m_highestActiveEdgeIndex; edgeCount++ ) {
3531  edge_type* edge = m_edgeSorts[edgeCount];
3532  if ( edge ) {
3533  active_edge_type *active = edge->activeData;
3534  tetraphilia_assert( active && prevBot <= active->curXBandBot );
3535  prevBot = active->curXBandBot;
3536  }
3537  }
3538  #endif
3539  }
3540  }
3541  else { // stage = 1
3542  // Compute area for each pixel in band
3543 
3544  m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand = limits<int_type>::min();
3545 
3546  // Compute area for band by looping over active edges and processing left-right edge fill pairs
3547  int windingSum;
3548  int leftEdgeCount = 0; // initialization to zero only to quiet a VC.NET level 4 warning, not really needed
3549  bool leftEdgeSet = false;
3550  for ( int edgeCount = 0; edgeCount <= m_highestActiveEdgeIndex; edgeCount++ ) {
3551 
3552  edge_type* edge = m_edgeSorts[edgeCount];
3553  if ( edge ) {
3554  active_edge_type *active = edge->activeData;
3555  windingSum = active->curWindingToRightOfEdge;
3556 
3557  if ( !leftEdgeSet ) {
3558  tetraphilia_assert( windingSum & 1 ); // windingSum to right of this edge should be ODD since there should be an even number of edges to the left of this edge
3559  leftEdgeSet = true;
3560  leftEdgeCount = edgeCount;
3561  } else if ( windingSum == 0 || ((windingSum & 1) == 0 && m_isEvenOddFill) ) {
3562 
3563  ReducerYield( 200 );
3564 
3565  // process left-right edge pair
3566  edge_type* leftEdge = m_edgeSorts[leftEdgeCount];
3567  edge_type* rightEdge = m_edgeSorts[edgeCount];
3568 
3569  AddTrans( leftEdge, rightEdge, yBandMin, yBandMax, processingFirstBandInScanLine );
3570  leftEdgeSet = false;
3571  }
3572  }
3573  }
3574  tetraphilia_assert( leftEdgeSet == false ); // should never have an unpaired left edge
3575 
3576  // Add implicit segment of zeros at end of band starting from m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand to positive infinity (i.e., the maximum int_type)
3577  // For the first band in the scanline, thie consists of adding a "terminator" segment with segStop = maximum int_type.
3578  // For subsequent bands in the scanline, one must Adjust the segments list accordingly to change any kOne segments which overlap the final kZero segment into kPixels.
3579  if ( processingFirstBandInScanLine ) {
3580  // put terminator segment in place after processing the first band
3581  processingFirstBandInScanLine = false;
3582  if ( m_lastSegDataBlock == m_firstSegDataBlock || m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType != kZero ) {
3583  m_lastSegDataBlock = NewSegmentDataBlock();
3584  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType = kZero;
3585  }
3586  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = limits<int_type>::max();
3587  } else {
3588  // account for terminating zero segment in secondary bands of scanline
3589  int_type max_int_coord = limits<int_type>::max();
3590  AdjustSegmentListWhenProcessingSecondaryBands( max_int_coord, max_int_coord, max_int_coord, max_int_coord, yBandMin, yBandMax );
3591  }
3592  }
3593  yBandMin = yBandMax;
3594 
3595  } while ( yBandMin != yScanLineEnd );
3596 
3597  // end of second stage?
3598  if ( stage != 0 ) {
3599  // process any INTERSECTIONS which occur EXACTLY at the bottom of the scanline we just processed (i.e., at the top of the upcoming scanline)
3600  while ( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_yVal == yBandMax ) {
3601  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_type == k_swap ); // we haven't searched for intersections in the next scanline yet so it can't be k_swapAtTopOfBand
3602  ProcessNextEdgeIntersectionChange();
3603  }
3604  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_yVal == limits<real_type>::max() );
3605 
3606  // pin pixel values to >= 0 and <= 1
3607  auto prevSeg = m_firstSegDataBlock;
3608  auto seg = prevSeg->m_next;
3609  while ( prevSeg->m_segStop <= m_constraints.m_bufferXMax ) {
3610  if ( seg->m_segType == kPixels ) {
3611  // pin results to between 0 and 1
3612  auto limit = t4::min<t4::int_coord>( seg->m_segStop, m_constraints.m_bufferXMax );
3613  auto i = t4::max<t4::int_coord>( prevSeg->m_segStop, m_constraints.m_bufferXMin );
3614  for ( ; i < limit; ++i ) {
3615  if ( m_pixelBuffer[i] > 1 )
3616  m_pixelBuffer[i] = 1;
3617  else if ( m_pixelBuffer[i] < 0 )
3618  m_pixelBuffer[i] = 0;
3619  }
3620  }
3621  prevSeg = seg;
3622  seg = seg->m_next;
3623  }
3624 
3625  break;
3626  }
3627 
3628  // apply edge changes in reverse until all changes with m_yVal > yScanLineStart have been reversed
3629  edge_intersection_change_type* intersectionChange = m_curEdgeIntersection - 1;
3630  edge_insertion_deletion_change_type* insertionDeletionChange = m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion - 1;
3631  while (1) {
3632 
3633  if ( insertionDeletionChange->m_yVal > intersectionChange->m_yVal
3634  || (insertionDeletionChange->m_yVal == intersectionChange->m_yVal && intersectionChange->m_type != k_swapAtTopOfBand) )
3635  {
3636  if ( insertionDeletionChange->m_yVal <= yScanLineStart )
3637  break;
3638 
3639  m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion = insertionDeletionChange; // --m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion;
3640 
3642  // UNDO EDGE CHANGES BACK TO TOP OF SCANLINE //
3644  if ( insertionDeletionChange->m_type == k_insert ) {
3645  EdgePairRemovalWorkhorse( false );
3646  }
3647  else if ( insertionDeletionChange->m_type == k_remove ) {
3648  // When the edges were previously removed, we cached on each edge the edge to its left when it was removed
3649  // and in place of the index, we stored the number of slots to the right from the edge it was on removal.
3650  // We use that information here to restore the edges.
3651  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->cachedEdgeToLeft[1] != NULL );
3652  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->cachedEdgeToLeft[1] != NULL );
3653 
3654  EdgePairInsertionWorkhorse( true );
3655  } else if ( insertionDeletionChange->m_type == k_replace ) {
3656  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion == insertionDeletionChange );
3657  tetraphilia_assert( m_numActiveEdges >= 2 );
3658  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->windingNum * m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->windingNum == 1 ); // both edges are downward or both are upward
3659  tetraphilia_assert( get_y(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->bot()) == get_y(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->top()) ); // x's may not be the same due to horizontal connection which got dropped
3660  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1] ) );
3661 
3662  EdgeReplacementWorkhorse( true );
3663  } else {
3664  tetraphilia_assert_always();
3665  }
3666 
3667  --insertionDeletionChange;
3668  }
3669  else {
3670  if ( intersectionChange->m_yVal <= yScanLineStart )
3671  break;
3672 
3673  m_curEdgeIntersection = intersectionChange; // --m_curEdgeIntersection;
3674  --m_curEdgeIntersectionIndex;
3675 
3676  // swap the edges
3677  EdgeSwapWorkhorse();
3678 
3679  --intersectionChange;
3680  }
3681 
3682  ReducerYield( 10 );
3683  }
3684 
3685  } // for (stage)
3686 
3687 
3688  m_prevSegDataBlock = t4::get_ptr( m_firstSegDataBlock );
3689  m_curSegDataBlock = t4::get_ptr( m_firstSegDataBlock->m_next );
3690 
3691 #ifdef PROFILE_BEZIER_REDUCER
3692  app_traits::context_type::high_precision_time_type end_nextscanline_time = app_traits::context_type::current_time();
3693  m_time_spent_in_NextScanLine += end_nextscanline_time - start_nextscanline_time;
3694  ++m_numTimesNextScanLineWasCalled;
3695 #endif
3696 }
3697 
3698 // Initialize curXBandTop and curXBandBot to the top of the specified scanline.
3699 // The edge should be active at some point in the specified scanline.
3700 // If the edge is not active at the top of the scanline, both values should be initialized with the x-value of edge->top().
3701 template<typename app_traits>
3702 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::InitializeEdgeToTopOfScanLine( edge_type* edge, int_type scanLineY )
3703 {
3704 
3705  if ( !edge->hasBeenActivated )
3706  ActivateEdge( edge );
3707  active_edge_type *active = edge->activeData;
3708 
3709 
3710  real_type scanLineYReal = real_type(scanLineY);
3711 
3712  tetraphilia_assert( edge->hasBeenActivated );
3713  tetraphilia_assert( get_y(edge->top()) < scanLineY + 1 && scanLineY < get_y(edge->bot()) );
3714 
3715  if ( edge->isLine ) {
3716  if ( scanLineYReal <= get_y(edge->top()) )
3717  active->curXBandTop = get_x(edge->top());
3718  else {
3719  real_type t = (scanLineYReal - get_y(edge->top())) * edge->deltaYInverse;
3720  PrecisionGuardian<real_type>::InFixedPointBuildsShiftAsNecessary( t, edge->deltaYInverseShift );
3721  tetraphilia_assert( 0 <= t && t <= real_type(1.001f) ); // not 1 because disivion can introduce significant errors
3722  active->curXBandTop = get_x(edge->top()) + t * edge->deltaX;
3723  // this assert can possible fail in strange cases when t is slightly above 0 or below 1?
3724  tetraphilia_assert( (get_x(edge->top()) <= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop <= real_services::AddAndPin(get_x(edge->bot()), edge->deltaX * real_type(0.001f))) ||
3725  (real_services::AddAndPin(get_x(edge->bot()), edge->deltaX * real_type(0.001f)) <= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop <= get_x(edge->top())) );
3726  }
3727 
3728  // set Bot value here for cases when we insert an edge in the middle of a scanline as it will be copied over the Top value in that case
3729  active->curXBandBot = active->curXBandTop;
3730  }
3731  else {
3732  while ( active->crossingBuffBotY <= scanLineYReal )
3733  ComputeCrossingTable( edge );
3734  tetraphilia_assert( scanLineY - active->crossingBuffTopY >= 0 && scanLineY < active->crossingBuffBotY );
3735  active->curXCross = &(*active->crossingXBufferPtr)[ static_cast<size_t>( scanLineY - active->crossingBuffTopY ) ];
3736 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_CROSSINGS
3737  active->curTCross = &active->crossingTBufferPtr[scanLineY - active->crossingBuffTopY];
3738 #endif
3739 
3740  if ( scanLineYReal > get_y(edge->top()) ) {
3741  active->curXBandTop = active->curXCross[0];
3742 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
3743  active->curTBandTop = active->curTCross[0];
3744 #endif
3745 // tetraphilia_assert( (get_x(edge->top()) <= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop <= get_x(edge->bot())) ||
3746 // (get_x(edge->top()) >= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop >= get_x(edge->bot())) );
3747  } else {
3748  active->curXBandTop = get_x(edge->top());
3749 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
3750  active->curTBandTop = 0;
3751 #endif
3752  }
3753  // set Bot values here for cases when we insert an edge in the middle of a scanline as they will be copied over the Top values in that case
3754 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
3755  active->curTBandBot = active->curTBandTop;
3756  tetraphilia_assert( 0 <= active->curTBandBot && active->curTBandBot <= 1 );
3757 #endif
3758  active->curXBandBot = active->curXBandTop;
3759  // This assert can hit on curves which are really quasi-vertical lines when the x values buffer gets projected past the x value of the actual endpoint in fixed-point builds where our precision is limited.
3760  //tetraphilia_assert( (get_x(edge->top()) <= active->curXBandBot && active->curXBandBot <= get_x(edge->bot())) ||
3761  // (get_x(edge->top()) >= active->curXBandBot && active->curXBandBot >= get_x(edge->bot())) );
3762  }
3763 }
3764 
3765 // Activate edge should only be called the first time an edge is placed into the m_edgeSorts list.
3766 // The responsibility of this method is to set curXBandTop and curXBandBot to the x value of
3767 // its top if its top is below the top of the scanline, otherwise to the edge's computed x value at the top of the scanline.
3768 template<typename app_traits>
3769 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::ActivateEdge( edge_type* edge )
3770 {
3771  tetraphilia_assert( !edge->hasBeenActivated && !edge->activeData );
3772  edge->hasBeenActivated = true;
3773  MakeActiveEdge(edge);
3774 
3775  active_edge_type *active = edge->activeData;
3776 
3777  if ( !edge->isLine ) {
3778  // TODO: bkaskel: consolidate the allocations for the 2 or 3 buffers here into a single alloc?
3779  active->crossingXBufferPtr = m_crossingBufPool.malloc();
3780 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_CROSSINGS
3781  active->crossingTBufferPtr = static_cast<real_type*>(m_crossingBufPool.malloc());
3782  active->tVal = 0;
3783  active->yVal = get_y(edge->top());
3784  active->xVal = get_x(edge->top());
3785 #endif
3786  active->firstCall = true;
3787 
3788  // call this only once here, it will be called additional times later in InitializeEdgeToTopOfScanLine if necessary
3789  ComputeCrossingTable( edge );
3790  }
3791 }
3792 
3793 // Returns the index at which the edge should be placed in m_edgeSorts (shifting any edge at that index higher up into the array)
3794 // to be correctly sorted at y = yVal (the current list is assumed to already be correctly sorted at this value).
3795 template<typename app_traits>
3796 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::FindEdgesInsertionIndex( edge_type** edge, int* index, int numEdges )
3797 {
3798  tetraphilia_assert( numEdges == 1 || numEdges == 2 );
3799  tetraphilia_assert( numEdges == 1 || get_x(edge[0]->top()) <= get_x(edge[1]->top()) );
3800  tetraphilia_assert( numEdges == 1 || cmpEdgeTopToEdgeMiddle( edge[0], edge[1] ) <= 0 );
3801 
3802  if (m_numActiveEdges == 0) {
3803  for (int j = 0; j < numEdges; ++j)
3804  index[j] = 0;
3805  return;
3806  }
3807 
3808  // binary search
3809  int low = 0;
3810  int i, i2;
3811  for (int j = 0; j < numEdges; ++j) {
3812 
3813  int high = static_cast<int>(m_highestActiveEdgeIndex) + 1;
3814 
3815  while (1) {
3816  while (low <= m_highestActiveEdgeIndex && m_edgeSorts[low] == nullptr)
3817  low++;
3818 
3819  tetraphilia_assert( low <= high );
3820  if (low == high) {
3821  index[j] = low;
3822  break;
3823  }
3824  i = i2 = (low + high) >> 1;
3825  while (m_edgeSorts[i] == nullptr) { // don't need to check if i >= 0 since we've guaranteed that i>= the initial value of low for which m_edgeSorts[i] != nullptr
3826  --i;
3827  tetraphilia_assert( i >= 0 );
3828  }
3829 
3830  bool edgeIsToRight = (cmpEdgeTopToEdgeMiddle( edge[j], m_edgeSorts[i] ) > 0);
3831  if ( edgeIsToRight )
3832  low = i2 + 1;
3833  else
3834  high = i;
3835  }
3836 
3837  if (j == 0 && numEdges == 2) {
3838  // typically, this will be true and will save us from running another search for the second edge
3839  if ( low > m_highestActiveEdgeIndex || cmpEdgeTopToEdgeMiddle( edge[1], m_edgeSorts[low] ) <= 0 ) {
3840  tetraphilia_assert( low > m_highestActiveEdgeIndex || m_edgeSorts[low] != NULL );
3841  index[1] = low;
3842  return;
3843  }
3844  }
3845  }
3846 }
3847 
3848 template<typename app_traits>
3849 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::EdgePairInsertionWorkhorse( bool processReverseRemoval )
3850 {
3851  tetraphilia_assert( (processReverseRemoval && m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_remove) ||
3852  (!processReverseRemoval && m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_insert) );
3853 
3854  // z = 0 when processing k_insert going forwards
3855  // z = 1 when processing k_remove going backwards
3856  int z = processReverseRemoval ? 1 : 0; // bkaskel: TODO: could probably eliminate the processForwardsRemoval argument and simply compute z based on m_type
3857 
3858  int index[2]; // m_edgeSorts indices where edges get inserted
3859 
3860  tetraphilia_assert( (m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == nullptr) == (m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == nullptr) );
3861  if ( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == nullptr ) {
3862 
3863  // should never get here when processing a k_remove backwards
3864  tetraphilia_assert( !processReverseRemoval );
3865  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_insert );
3866 
3867  // find location(s) to insert edges
3868  tetraphilia_assert( get_x(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->top()) <= get_x(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->top()) );
3869  FindEdgesInsertionIndex( &m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0], &index[0], 2 );
3870  tetraphilia_assert( 0 <= index[0] && index[0] <= index[1] && static_cast<size_t>(index[1]) < m_edgeSortsArraySize );
3871 
3872  if (index[0] > m_highestActiveEdgeIndex) {
3873  tetraphilia_assert( index[0] == index[1] && index[0] == m_highestActiveEdgeIndex + 1 );
3874  tetraphilia_assert( index[0] + 1 < static_cast<int>(m_edgeSortsArraySize) );
3875  tetraphilia_assert( m_edgeSorts[index[0]] == nullptr && m_edgeSorts[index[0] + 1] == nullptr );
3876  index[1]++;
3877  }
3878  else {
3879  int q = (index[0] == index[1]) ? 1 : 0;
3880  for (int k = 0; k < 2 + q; k++) {
3881  int j = k & 1;
3882  if (index[j] > 0 && m_edgeSorts[index[j]-1] == nullptr)
3883  index[j]--;
3884  }
3885  }
3886 
3887  // shift pointers to the right in m_edgeSorts if necessary
3888  // NOTE: The m_edgeSorts array was allocated large enough so that it is always safe to
3889  // move pointers to the right in this fashion.
3890  if ( index[0] == index[1] || m_edgeSorts[index[0]] != nullptr || m_edgeSorts[index[1]] != nullptr ) {
3891  // at least one of the necessary slots after the specified indices is currently in use
3892  int rangeEnd[2];
3893  int i = index[0];
3894  // find indices of 2 NULLs to be filled over
3895  for (int j = 0;;j++) {
3896  for (;;i++)
3897  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] == nullptr ) {
3898  rangeEnd[j] = i;
3899  break;
3900  }
3901  tetraphilia_assert( static_cast<size_t>(i) < m_edgeSortsArraySize - (1 - static_cast<size_t>(j)) );
3902  if (j)
3903  break;
3904  else
3905  i = t4::max<int>( i+1, index[1] );
3906  }
3907  // Shift edge pointers in m_edgeSorts
3908  int i1 = t4::min<int>(index[1], rangeEnd[0]);
3909  int i2 = t4::max<int>(index[1], rangeEnd[0] + 1);
3910  bool shiftedOneOfFirstTwoBatchesOfSlots = false;
3911  int start[3] = { rangeEnd[1] - 1, rangeEnd[0] - 1, i1 - 1 };
3912  int end[3] = { i2, index[1], index[0] };
3913  for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++)
3914  for (i = start[j]; i >= end[j]; i--) {
3915  int dstIndex = i + ((j == 1) ? 2 : 1);
3916  if (!shiftedOneOfFirstTwoBatchesOfSlots) {
3917  if (dstIndex > m_highestActiveEdgeIndex)
3918  m_highestActiveEdgeIndex = dstIndex;
3919  tetraphilia_assert( m_highestActiveEdgeIndex < static_cast<int>(m_edgeSortsArraySize) );
3920  shiftedOneOfFirstTwoBatchesOfSlots = true;
3921  }
3922  m_edgeSorts[dstIndex] = m_edgeSorts[i];
3923  #ifndef NDEBUG
3924  m_edgeSorts[i] = nullptr; // this will be overwritten soon anyway so we only bother setting it to NULL in debug builds for the check later on
3925  #endif
3926  tetraphilia_assert( m_edgeSorts[dstIndex] != NULL );
3927  m_edgeSorts[dstIndex]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex = dstIndex;
3928  ReducerYield( 10 );
3929  }
3930 
3931  // if first NULL found is at or past index[1], then increment index[1]
3932  if (rangeEnd[0] >= index[1])
3933  index[1]++;
3934  }
3935 
3936  // insert edges into list
3937  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
3938  tetraphilia_assert( m_edgeSorts[index[i]] == NULL ); // (we only bother to set these to NULL in DEBUG builds)
3939  edge_type* edge = m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[i];
3940  m_edgeSorts[index[i]] = edge;
3941  edge->activeData->edgeSortsIndex = index[i];
3942  }
3943 
3944  tetraphilia_assert( index[1] > index[0] );
3945  if (index[1] > m_highestActiveEdgeIndex)
3946  m_highestActiveEdgeIndex = index[1];
3947  tetraphilia_assert( m_highestActiveEdgeIndex < static_cast<int>(m_edgeSortsArraySize) );
3948 
3949  } else { // cachedEdgeToLeft[z] != NULL so we know where to put the edges
3950 
3951  // It is vital that we insert edge 0 first since the edge to the left of edge 1 might be (and in fact usually will be) edge 0.
3952  for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i) {
3953  edge_type* edgeToBeInserted = m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[i];
3954  if (!edgeToBeInserted->hasBeenActivated)
3955  ActivateEdge(edgeToBeInserted);
3956  edge_type* cachedEdgeToLeftWhenInserted = edgeToBeInserted->cachedEdgeToLeft[z];
3957  index[i] = (cachedEdgeToLeftWhenInserted != kOffLeftEdge ) ? cachedEdgeToLeftWhenInserted->activeData->edgeSortsIndex + 1 : 0;
3958  InsertEdgeAtIndex( edgeToBeInserted, index[i] );
3959  }
3960  }
3961 
3962  m_numActiveEdges += 2;
3963 
3964  // Fix winding numbers of two newly inserted edges and any edges in between them.
3965  // (in the reverse-removal case, the inserted edges should already have the correct winding number on them, but we recompute them here anyway)
3966  tetraphilia_assert( index[0] < index[1] );
3967  int_type previousWindingNumber = 0;
3968  for (int i = index[0] - 1; i >= 0; --i)
3969  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] ) {
3970  previousWindingNumber = m_edgeSorts[i]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge;
3971  break;
3972  }
3973  for (int i = index[0]; i <= index[1]; ++i)
3974  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] )
3975  m_edgeSorts[i]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge = previousWindingNumber = previousWindingNumber + m_edgeSorts[i]->windingNum;
3976 }
3977 
3978 template<typename app_traits>
3979 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::EdgePairRemovalWorkhorse( bool processForwardsRemoval )
3980 {
3981  tetraphilia_assert( (processForwardsRemoval && m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_remove) ||
3982  (!processForwardsRemoval && m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_insert) );
3983 
3984  // z = 0 when processing k_insert going backwards
3985  // z = 1 when processing k_remove going forwards
3986  int z = processForwardsRemoval ? 1 : 0; // bkaskel: TODO: could probably eliminate the processForwardsRemoval argument and simply compute z based on m_type
3987 
3988  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0] ) );
3989  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1] ) );
3990  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->windingNum * m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->windingNum == -1 ); // one edge is downward the other is upward
3991 
3992  // Location of specified edges in the sort list are stored on the edges.
3993  int index[2];
3994  for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
3995  index[i] = m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[i]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex;
3996 
3997  tetraphilia_assert( (m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == nullptr) == (m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == nullptr) );
3998  if ( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == nullptr ) {
3999  // Ensure edge order in change record matches sort order before removal. We rely on this later during re-insertions.
4000  if ( index[0] > index[1]) {
4001  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_remove ); // should never reach here during an anti-insertion
4002  boost::swap( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0], m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1] );
4003  boost::swap( index[0], index[1] );
4004  }
4005 
4006  // record the edge to the left of each edge
4007  for (int i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
4008  m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[i]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] = FindEdgeToLeft( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[i] ); // returns (void*)1 if no edge found
4009  }
4010  tetraphilia_assert( index[0] < index[1] );
4011  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == FindEdgeToLeft( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0] ) );
4012  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == FindEdgeToLeft( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1] ) );
4013 
4014  // Adjust winding number for edges in between the removed edges.
4015  // Most of the time we've just removed adjacent edges so there are usually no "in between" edges to process here.
4016  for (int i = index[0] + 1; i < index[1]; ++i)
4017  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] )
4018  m_edgeSorts[i]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge -= m_edgeSorts[index[0]]->windingNum;
4019 
4020  tetraphilia_assert( m_numActiveEdges >= 2 );
4021 
4022  // remove specified edges from list
4023  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
4024  m_edgeSorts[index[i]] = nullptr;
4025  --m_numActiveEdges;
4026  tetraphilia_assert( m_highestActiveEdgeIndex >= 0 );
4027  tetraphilia_assert( (index[i] == m_highestActiveEdgeIndex) == (m_edgeSorts[m_highestActiveEdgeIndex] == nullptr) ); // index[i] == m_highestActiveEdgeIndex iff m_edgeSorts[m_highestActiveEdgeIndex] == nullptr
4028  while (m_highestActiveEdgeIndex >= 0 && m_edgeSorts[m_highestActiveEdgeIndex] == nullptr)
4029  --m_highestActiveEdgeIndex;
4030  }
4031 
4032  ClearActiveEdge(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]);
4033  ClearActiveEdge(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]);
4034 }
4035 
4036 template<typename app_traits>
4037 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::EdgeReplacementWorkhorse( bool processBackwards )
4038 {
4039  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_replace );
4040 
4041  // z = 0 when processing replacement forwards
4042  // z = 1 when processing replacement backwards
4043  int z = processBackwards ? 1 : 0;
4044 
4045  edge_type* edgeToBeRemoved = m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[z];
4046  edge_type* edgeToBeInserted = m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1-z];
4047  int indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved = edgeToBeRemoved->activeData->edgeSortsIndex;
4048  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( edgeToBeRemoved ) );
4049  tetraphilia_assert( 0 <= indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved && indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved < static_cast<int>(m_edgeSortsArraySize) );
4050 
4051  if (!edgeToBeInserted->hasBeenActivated)
4052  ActivateEdge(edgeToBeInserted);
4053 
4054  if ( get_x(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->bot()) == get_x(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->top()) ) {
4055  // the usual case
4056 
4057  // simply replace edge
4058  m_edgeSorts[indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved] = edgeToBeInserted;
4059  edgeToBeInserted->activeData->edgeSortsIndex = indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved;
4060  // tetraphilia_assert( !processBackwards || edgeToBeInserted->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge == edgeToBeRemoved->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge );
4061  edgeToBeInserted->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge = edgeToBeRemoved->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge; // should already be correctly set when processing Backwards, but we set it here anyway. So this can be conditionalized if desired.
4062  } else {
4063  if ( edgeToBeRemoved->cachedEdgeToLeft[1-z] == nullptr )
4064  edgeToBeRemoved->cachedEdgeToLeft[1-z] = FindEdgeToLeft( edgeToBeRemoved ); // returns 1 when no edge to left is found
4065  tetraphilia_assert( edgeToBeRemoved->cachedEdgeToLeft[1-z] == FindEdgeToLeft( edgeToBeRemoved ) );
4066 
4067  // remove edgeToBeRemoved
4068  m_edgeSorts[indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved] = nullptr;
4069  if (indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved == m_highestActiveEdgeIndex) {
4070  do
4071  --m_highestActiveEdgeIndex;
4072  while (m_highestActiveEdgeIndex >= 0 && m_edgeSorts[m_highestActiveEdgeIndex] == nullptr );
4073  }
4074 
4075  // compute indexOfEdgeToBeInserted
4076  int indexOfEdgeToBeInserted;
4077  tetraphilia_assert( !processBackwards || edgeToBeInserted->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] != NULL ); // cached pointer should never be NULL when processing backwards
4078  if ( edgeToBeInserted->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == nullptr ) {
4079  // find location(s) to insert new edge
4080  FindEdgesInsertionIndex( &edgeToBeInserted, &indexOfEdgeToBeInserted, 1 );
4081  // set winding number on edge to be inserted
4082  int_type previousWindingNumber = 0;
4083  for (int i = indexOfEdgeToBeInserted - 1; i >= 0; --i)
4084  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] ) {
4085  previousWindingNumber = m_edgeSorts[i]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge;
4086  if ( i > indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved )
4087  previousWindingNumber -= edgeToBeRemoved->windingNum;
4088  break;
4089  }
4090  edgeToBeInserted->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge = previousWindingNumber + edgeToBeInserted->windingNum;
4091  } else {
4092  tetraphilia_assert( edgeToBeInserted->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] == kOffLeftEdge || edgeIsCurrentlyActive( edgeToBeInserted->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] ) ); // asserts that referenced edge is active
4093  indexOfEdgeToBeInserted = edgeToBeInserted->cachedEdgeToLeft[z] != kOffLeftEdge ? edgeToBeInserted->cachedEdgeToLeft[z]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex + 1 : 0;
4094 
4095  // ORIGINALLY, BEFORE WE HAD THE activeData stuff implemented, this section was just
4096  // an assert since an edge in this case would already have had the correct curWindingToRightOfEdge value
4097  // since it must have been removed from the same spot for the cahgedEdgeToLeft[z] to be non-null.
4098  // At some point we may want to review this and perhaps move curWindingToRightOfEdge to the edge
4099  // instead of activeData, though I suspect the ram savings by keeping it in active data outweight
4100  // the cost of always running the block of code below.
4101  //#ifndef NDEBUG // winding number would already be correct in this case before we implemented the activeData mechanism
4102  {
4103  int_type previousWindingNumber = 0;
4104  for (int i = indexOfEdgeToBeInserted - 1; i >= 0; --i)
4105  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] ) {
4106  previousWindingNumber = m_edgeSorts[i]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge;
4107  if ( i > indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved )
4108  previousWindingNumber -= edgeToBeRemoved->windingNum;
4109  break;
4110  }
4111  //tetraphilia_assert( edgeToBeInserted->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge == previousWindingNumber + edgeToBeInserted->windingNum );
4112  // the line below replaced the assert above once we could no longer count on having the right value here and the assert-block was turned into an always-run block of code.
4113  edgeToBeInserted->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge = previousWindingNumber + edgeToBeInserted->windingNum;
4114  }
4115  //#endif
4116  }
4117 
4118  // insert edgeToBeInserted
4119  tetraphilia_assert( 0 <= indexOfEdgeToBeInserted && indexOfEdgeToBeInserted < static_cast<int>(m_edgeSortsArraySize) );
4120  InsertEdgeAtIndex( edgeToBeInserted, indexOfEdgeToBeInserted );
4121  tetraphilia_assert( edgeToBeInserted->activeData->edgeSortsIndex == indexOfEdgeToBeInserted );
4122  tetraphilia_assert( m_highestActiveEdgeIndex < static_cast<int>(m_edgeSortsArraySize) );
4123 
4124  // Need to fix winding numbers between indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved and indexOfEdgeToBeInserted
4125  // At this point exactly one of the following must be true
4126  // (a) indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved == indexOfEdgeToBeInserted
4127  // (b) indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved < indexOfEdgeToBeInserted && m_edgeSorts[indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved] == 0
4128  // (c) indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved > indexOfEdgeToBeInserted && m_edgeSorts[indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved] == 0
4129  // (d) indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved > indexOfEdgeToBeInserted && m_edgeSorts[indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved] != 0
4130  // And if d is true then m_edgeSorts[indexOfEdgeToBeInserted -> indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved] are all non-NULL and
4131  // we must make sure to reset the current winding value on m_edgeSorts[indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved]
4132  // which is why we loop until i <= end below.
4133  int start = indexOfEdgeToBeRemoved;
4134  int end = indexOfEdgeToBeInserted;
4135  int previousWindingNumber;
4136  if ( start > end ) {
4137  boost::swap( start, end );
4138  previousWindingNumber = edgeToBeInserted->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge;
4139  } else {
4140  previousWindingNumber = edgeToBeRemoved->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge - edgeToBeRemoved->windingNum;
4141  }
4142  for (int i = start + 1; i <= end; ++i) { // must include i=end case as we may have gotten it wrong above due to the fact that edgeToBeInserted had not yet been inserted to its left
4143  edge_type* e = m_edgeSorts[i];
4144  if ( e )
4145  e->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge = previousWindingNumber = previousWindingNumber + e->windingNum;
4146  }
4147  }
4148 
4149  ClearActiveEdge(edgeToBeRemoved);
4150 }
4151 
4152 template<typename app_traits>
4153 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::ProcessNextEdgeInsertionDeletionChange( int_type scanLineY )
4154 {
4155  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0] != nullptr && m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1] != nullptr );
4156  tetraphilia_assert( scanLineY <= m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_yVal && m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_yVal < scanLineY + 1 );
4157 
4158  if ( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_insert ) {
4159  // initialize edges to top of scanline
4160  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->hasBeenActivated == m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->hasBeenActivated );
4161  InitializeEdgeToTopOfScanLine( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0], scanLineY );
4162  InitializeEdgeToTopOfScanLine( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1], scanLineY );
4163 
4164  EdgePairInsertionWorkhorse( false );
4165  } else if ( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_remove ) {
4166  EdgePairRemovalWorkhorse( true );
4167  } else { // k_replace
4168  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_type == k_replace );
4169  tetraphilia_assert( m_numActiveEdges >= 2 );
4170  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->windingNum * m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->windingNum == 1 ); // both edges are downward or both are upward
4171  tetraphilia_assert( get_y(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[0]->bot()) == get_y(m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1]->top()) ); // x's may not be the same due to horizontal connection which got dropped
4172 
4173  InitializeEdgeToTopOfScanLine( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_edge[1], scanLineY );
4174 
4175  EdgeReplacementWorkhorse( false );
4176  }
4177 
4178  ++m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion;
4179 }
4180 
4181 template<typename app_traits>
4182 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::ProcessNextEdgeIntersectionChange()
4183 {
4184  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[0] != nullptr && m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[1] != nullptr );
4185  tetraphilia_assert( m_curScanLine <= m_curEdgeIntersection->m_yVal && m_curEdgeIntersection->m_yVal <= m_curScanLine + 1 );
4186  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_type == k_swap || m_curEdgeIntersection->m_type == k_swapAtTopOfBand );
4187 
4188  // If next edge change is a swap of two edges which are NOT currently adjacent,
4189  // then we must postpone that swap until they are adjacent. This can occur when
4190  // multiple edges intersect at the same point.
4191  int numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle;
4192  for ( numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle = 0; ; ++numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle) {
4193 
4194  // assert edges are defined and currently active
4195  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_type != k_terminator );
4196  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_type == k_swap || m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_type == k_swapAtTopOfBand );
4197  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_edge[0] != nullptr );
4198  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_edge[1] != nullptr );
4199  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_edge[0] ) );
4200  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_edge[1] ) );
4201 
4202  int index0 = m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_edge[0]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex;
4203  int index1 = m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle].m_edge[1]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex;
4204  int end = t4::max<int>(index0, index1);
4205  int start = index0 + index1 - end + 1; // start = t4::min<int>(index0, index1) + 1
4206  int i;
4207  for (i = start; i < end; ++i) {
4208  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] )
4209  break;
4210  }
4211  if ( i == end )
4212  break; // edges of SWAP m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle] are adjacent
4213  }
4214 
4215  // if numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle > 0, rotate edge changes by pushing down numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle records and bringing the numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle-th record to the top
4216  if ( numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle ) {
4217  edge_intersection_change_type tmp = m_curEdgeIntersection[numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle];
4218  for (int i = numNonAdjacentSwapsToHandle; i; --i) {
4219  m_curEdgeIntersection[i] = m_curEdgeIntersection[i-1];
4220  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( tmp.m_yVal >= m_curEdgeIntersection[i].m_yVal && tmp.m_yVal - m_curEdgeIntersection[i].m_yVal < 0.007 ); // expect multiple intersections to register y values all within 0.007
4221  if ( tmp.m_yVal > m_curEdgeIntersection[i].m_yVal ) {
4222  m_curEdgeIntersection[i].m_yVal = tmp.m_yVal; // setting y value of all bypassed edge_changes to match the next adjacent one keeps y values increasing
4223  m_curEdgeIntersection[i].m_type = k_swap; // overwrites k_swapAtTopOfBand if present (often will simply overwrite the same value)
4224  }
4225  }
4226  m_curEdgeIntersection[0] = tmp;
4227  return; // return in case there are any insertion/deletion changes which must happen before m_curEdgeIntersection[0]
4228  }
4229 
4230  // swap the edges
4231  EdgeSwapWorkhorse();
4232 
4233  ++m_curEdgeIntersection;
4234  ++m_curEdgeIntersectionIndex;
4235 }
4236 
4237 // Called to swap the edges according to m_curEdgeIntersection.
4238 // This method is used when processing edge changes forwards or backwards.
4239 template<typename app_traits>
4240 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::EdgeSwapWorkhorse()
4241 {
4242  // assert at least 2 edges are currently active (somewhat redundant with the check below, but not entirely)
4243  tetraphilia_assert( m_numActiveEdges >= 2 );
4244  // assert the intersecting edges are currently active
4245  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[0] ) );
4246  tetraphilia_assert( edgeIsCurrentlyActive( m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[1] ) );
4247  // assert edges are adjacent
4248  #ifndef NDEBUG
4249  {
4250  int index0 = m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[0]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex;
4251  int index1 = m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[1]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex;
4252  int end = t4::max<int>(index0, index1);
4253  int start = index0 + index1 - end + 1;
4254  int i;
4255  for (i = start; i < end; ++i)
4256  if ( m_edgeSorts[i] )
4257  break;
4258  tetraphilia_assert( i == end ); // asserting that edges to be swapped are currently adjacent
4259  }
4260  #endif
4261 
4262  // From here on down we assume the swap is of adjacent edges.
4263 
4264  // Find and swap the edges
4265  int i, j, index[2];
4266  for (i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
4267  index[i] = m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[i]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex;
4268  for (i = 0, j = 1; j >= 0; ++i, --j) {
4269  m_edgeSorts[index[i]] = m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[j];
4270  m_curEdgeIntersection->m_edge[j]->activeData->edgeSortsIndex = index[i];
4271  }
4272 
4273  // repair curWindingToRightOfEdge for each edge (we've guaranteed they are adjacent)
4274  int maxindex = t4::max<int>(index[0], index[1]);
4275  int minindex = index[0] + index[1] - maxindex;
4276  int_type tmp = m_edgeSorts[minindex]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge;
4277  m_edgeSorts[minindex]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge = m_edgeSorts[maxindex]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge - m_edgeSorts[maxindex]->windingNum + m_edgeSorts[minindex]->windingNum;
4278  m_edgeSorts[maxindex]->activeData->curWindingToRightOfEdge = tmp;
4279 }
4280 
4281 // Adjust data of active edges
4282 // TODO: bkaskel: This looks awfully similar to the InitializeEdgeToTopOfScanLine function, see if they should be consolidated
4283 template<typename app_traits>
4284 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::SetEdgeTopDataForTopOfCurrentScanLine(int_type nextY)
4285 {
4286  tetraphilia_assert( m_curEdgeInsertionDeletion->m_yVal >= nextY ); // all edge changes before m_curScanLine+1 should have benn processed before calling this routine
4287 
4288  for ( int i = m_highestActiveEdgeIndex; i >= 0; --i) {
4289  edge_type* edge = m_edgeSorts[i];
4290  if ( edge ) {
4291  tetraphilia_assert( get_y(edge->top()) <= nextY && nextY <= get_y(edge->bot()) );
4292  active_edge_type *active = edge->activeData;
4293 #ifdef SET_X_FROM_INTERSECTIONS
4294  if ( !edge->xSetFromIntersection )
4295 #endif
4296  {
4297  if ( edge->isLine ) {
4298  real_type t = (nextY - get_y(edge->top())) * edge->deltaYInverse;
4299  PrecisionGuardian<real_type>::InFixedPointBuildsShiftAsNecessary( t, edge->deltaYInverseShift );
4300  tetraphilia_assert( 0 <= t && t <= real_type(1.001f) ); // not 1 because disivion can introduce significant errors
4301  active->curXBandTop = get_x(edge->top()) + t * edge->deltaX;
4302  // this assert can possible fail in strange cases when t is slightly above 0 or below 1?
4303  tetraphilia_assert( (get_x(edge->top()) <= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop <= real_services::AddAndPin(get_x(edge->bot()), edge->deltaX * real_type(0.001f))) ||
4304  (real_services::AddAndPin(get_x(edge->bot()), edge->deltaX * real_type(0.001f)) <= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop <= get_x(edge->top())) );
4305  }
4306  else {
4307  while ( active->crossingBuffBotY <= nextY )
4308  ComputeCrossingTable( edge );
4309  tetraphilia_assert( nextY - active->crossingBuffTopY >= 0 );
4310  active->curXCross = &(*active->crossingXBufferPtr)[ static_cast<size_t>( nextY - active->crossingBuffTopY ) ];
4311  #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_CROSSINGS
4312  active->curTCross = &active->crossingTBufferPtr[nextY - active->crossingBuffTopY];
4313  #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4314  active->curTBandTop = active->curTCross[0];
4315  #endif
4316  #endif
4317  active->curXBandTop = active->curXCross[0];
4318  }
4319  #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_CROSSINGS
4320  tetraphilia_assert( (get_x(edge->top()) <= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop <= get_x(edge->bot())) ||
4321  (get_x(edge->top()) >= active->curXBandTop && active->curXBandTop >= get_x(edge->bot())) );
4322  #endif
4323  }
4324 #ifdef SET_X_FROM_INTERSECTIONS
4325  else
4326  edge->xSetFromIntersection = false;
4327 #endif
4328  }
4329  }
4330 }
4331 
4332 template<typename app_traits>
4333 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::FillPixels( real_type xmin,
4334  int_type ixmin,
4335  real_type xmax,
4336  int_type ixmax,
4337 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4338  edge_type* edge,
4339 #endif
4340  real_type yBandMin,
4341  real_type yBandMax,
4342  bool areaToRight )
4343 {
4344  int_type numpix = ixmax - ixmin;
4345  real_type yBandHeight = yBandMax - yBandMin;
4346  if ( ixmin >= get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) || ixmax <= get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) )
4347  return;
4348 
4349  bool xminClipped = ixmin < get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds);
4350  real_type newVal;
4351  if ( numpix == 1 ) {
4352  if ( !xminClipped ) {
4353  real_type area;
4354 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4355  if ( edge->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine )
4356 #endif
4357  area = (1 - real_services::Fraction(real_services::DivideBy2(xmax + xmin))) * yBandHeight;
4358 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4359  else {
4360  BezierSegment<point_type> seg;
4361  InitLocalBezierObject( edge, seg, yBandMin, yBandMax );
4362  real_type xPixelOrigin = real_type(ixmin);
4363  for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
4364  get_x(seg.controlPoint[i]) -= xPixelOrigin;
4365  get_y(seg.controlPoint[i]) -= yBandMin;
4366  }
4367  ComputeSignedAreaBetweenSegmentAndYAxis( seg, area );
4368  area = yBandHeight - area;
4369  }
4370 #endif
4371 
4372  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( ((xmax == ixmax) ? 0 : (yBandHeight * (1 - real_services::Fraction( xmax )))) <= area + .001
4373  && area <= yBandHeight * (1 - real_services::Fraction( xmin )) + .001 );
4374 
4375  if (area < 0)
4376  area = 0;
4377  else if (area > yBandHeight)
4378  area = yBandHeight;
4379 
4380  if ( ixmin >= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop ) {
4381  // first time processing this pixel in this scanline so don't fetch value from m_pixelBuffer
4382  if ( areaToRight )
4383  newVal = area;
4384  else
4385  newVal = yBandHeight - area;
4386  } else {
4387  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= ixmin && ixmin < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4388  newVal = m_pixelBuffer[ixmin];
4389  if ( ixmin < m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand ) {
4390  // not the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND
4391  if ( areaToRight )
4392  newVal += area;
4393  else
4394  newVal -= area;
4395  } else {
4396  // the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND (which is NOT the top band)
4397  if ( areaToRight )
4398  newVal += area;
4399  else
4400  newVal += yBandHeight - area;
4401  }
4402  }
4403  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( -0.001 <= newVal && newVal <= 1.001 );
4404  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= ixmin && ixmin < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4405  m_pixelBuffer[ixmin] = newVal;
4406  }
4407  } else if ( numpix > 0 ) {
4408 
4409  real_type x = real_type(ixmin + 1);
4410  real_type dx = x - xmin;
4411  real_type slope, area, y;
4412 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4413  real_type t2;
4414  BezierSegment<point_type> seg;
4415  bool edgeSlopeIsNegative = (edge->deltaXSign < 0);
4416 #endif
4417  int_type curX;
4418  int_type xMax = real_services::FloorToInt( ArgType<int_type>(), xmax ); // TODO: bkaskel: can this be changed to ixmax?
4419  if ( xMax > get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) )
4420  xMax = get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds);
4421 
4422 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4423  if ( edge->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine ) {
4424 #endif
4425  slope = ReciprocalEstimate( xmax - xmin ) * yBandHeight; // yBandHeight / (xmax-xmin)
4426  y = (dx + real_type(.5)) * slope;
4427 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4428  } else {
4429  // initialize seg
4430  InitLocalBezierObject( edge, seg, yBandMin, yBandMax, true );
4431  tetraphilia_assert( t4::min<real_type>(active->curXBandTop,active->curXBandBot) <= get_y(seg.controlPoint[0]) && get_y(seg.controlPoint[0]) <= xmax );
4432  tetraphilia_assert( t4::min<real_type>(active->curXBandTop,active->curXBandBot) <= get_y(seg.controlPoint[3]) && get_y(seg.controlPoint[3]) <= xmax );
4433  // ensure the segment stretches from xmin to xmax (either of which might have been increased earlier)
4434  if ( get_y(seg.controlPoint[0]) < xmin ) {
4435  get_y(seg.controlPoint[0]) = xmin;
4436  if ( get_y(seg.controlPoint[1]) < xmin )
4437  get_y(seg.controlPoint[1]) = xmin;
4438  }
4439  if ( get_y(seg.controlPoint[3]) < xmax )
4440  get_y(seg.controlPoint[3]) = xmax;
4441  real_type xPixelOrigin = real_type(ixmin);
4442  for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
4443  get_x(seg.controlPoint[i]) -= yBandMin;
4444  get_y(seg.controlPoint[i]) -= xPixelOrigin;
4445  }
4446  }
4447 #endif
4448 
4449  // first pixel of (unclipped) segment (moving left to right, edge enters pixel top or bottom at x=xmin and exits on the pixel's right at x=ixmin+1)
4450  if ( xminClipped ) {
4451  curX = get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds);
4452 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4453  if ( edge->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine )
4454 #endif
4455  y += slope * (curX - ixmin - 1);
4456 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4457  else {
4458  #if defined(PROFILE_BEZIER_REDUCER) && PROFILE_BEZIER_REDUCER >= 2
4459  app_traits::context_type::high_precision_time_type start_Inverse_time = app_traits::context_type::current_time();
4460  #endif
4461 
4462  real_type adjustedX = real_type(curX - ixmin);
4463  real_type t;
4464  InverseYOfBezierSegment( seg, adjustedX, t );
4465 
4466  #if defined(PROFILE_BEZIER_REDUCER) && PROFILE_BEZIER_REDUCER >= 2
4467  app_traits::context_type::high_precision_time_type end_Inverse_time = app_traits::context_type::current_time();
4468  m_time_spent_in_Inverse_in_xminClipped_case += end_Inverse_time - start_Inverse_time;
4469  ++m_numTimesInverse_in_xminClipped_case;
4470  #endif
4471 
4472  // adjust seg to start at the left side of the constraints (curX)
4473  BezierSegment<point_type> dummy;
4474  SplitOffLowTSideOfBezierSegmentAtTPinningCentralYValue( seg, dummy, t, adjustedX );
4475  }
4476 #endif
4477  } else {
4478 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4479  if ( edge->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine )
4480 #endif
4481  area = dx * dx * real_services::DivideBy2(slope);
4482 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4483  else {
4484  if ( get_y(seg.controlPoint[0]) < 0 ) {
4485  // should very rarely hit this code
4486  // TODO: bkaskel: can this block be removed???
4487  tetraphilia_assert_always(); // just checking to see when this is hit: CAN BE REMOVED
4488  InverseYOfBezierSegment( seg, 0, t2 );
4489  BezierSegment<point_type> dummy;
4490  SplitOffLowTSideOfBezierSegmentAtTPinningCentralYValue( seg, dummy, t2, 0 );
4491  }
4492  BezierSegment<point_type> pixelSeg;
4493  InverseYOfBezierSegment( seg, real_type(1), t2 );
4494  SplitOffLowTSideOfBezierSegmentAtTPinningCentralYValue( seg, pixelSeg, t2, real_type(1) );
4495  real_type integral;
4496  ComputeSignedAreaBetweenSegmentAndYAxis( pixelSeg, integral );
4497 
4498  real_type maxIntegral = dx * yBandHeight;
4499  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( -.001 <= integral && integral <= dx * yBandHeight + .001 );
4500  if ( integral < 0 )
4501  integral = 0;
4502  else if ( integral > maxIntegral )
4503  integral = maxIntegral;
4504 
4505  if ( edgeSlopeIsNegative )
4506  area = dx * yBandHeight - integral;
4507  else
4508  area = integral;
4509  }
4510 #endif
4511  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( (-real_type(0.003) <= area && area <= yBandHeight * dx + real_type(0.003))
4512  && (-real_type(0.003) <= yBandHeight - area && yBandHeight - area <= yBandHeight + real_type(0.003)) );
4513 
4514  if ( ixmin >= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop ) {
4515  // first time processing this pixel in this scanline so don't fetch value from m_pixelBuffer
4516  if ( areaToRight )
4517  newVal = area;
4518  else
4519  newVal = yBandHeight - area;
4520  } else {
4521  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= ixmin && ixmin < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4522  newVal = m_pixelBuffer[ixmin];
4523  if ( ixmin < m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand ) {
4524  // not the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND
4525  if ( areaToRight )
4526  newVal += area;
4527  else
4528  newVal -= area;
4529  } else {
4530  // the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND (which is NOT the top band)
4531  if ( areaToRight )
4532  newVal += area;
4533  else
4534  newVal += yBandHeight - area;
4535  }
4536  }
4537  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( -0.001 <= newVal && newVal <= 1.001 );
4538  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= ixmin && ixmin < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4539  m_pixelBuffer[ixmin] = newVal;
4540  curX = ixmin + 1;
4541  }
4542 
4543  // inner pixels of (unclipped) segment (moving left to right, edge enters each pixel's left side at x=curX and exits pixel's right side at x=curX+1)
4544  while ( curX < xMax ) {
4545 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4546  if ( edge->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine )
4547 #endif
4548  {
4549  area = y;
4550  y += slope;
4551  }
4552 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4553  else {
4554  real_type shiftedXValue = real_type(curX - ixmin + 1); // TODO: bkaskel: should this instead be maintained in a persistent variable and incremented here??
4555  tetraphilia_assert( get_y(seg.controlPoint[0]) <= shiftedXValue && shiftedXValue <= get_y(seg.controlPoint[3]) );
4556  InverseYOfBezierSegment( seg, shiftedXValue, t2 );
4557  BezierSegment<point_type> pixelSeg;
4558  SplitOffLowTSideOfBezierSegmentAtTPinningCentralYValue( seg, pixelSeg, t2, shiftedXValue );
4559  real_type integral;
4560  ComputeSignedAreaBetweenSegmentAndYAxis( pixelSeg, integral );
4561 
4562  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( -.002 <= integral && integral <= yBandHeight + .002 );
4563  if ( integral < 0 )
4564  integral = 0;
4565  else if ( integral > yBandHeight )
4566  integral = yBandHeight;
4567 
4568  if ( edgeSlopeIsNegative )
4569  area = yBandHeight - integral;
4570  else
4571  area = integral;
4572  }
4573 #endif
4574  tetraphilia_assert( 0 <= area && area <= yBandHeight );
4575 
4576  if ( curX >= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop ) {
4577  // first time processing this pixel in this scanline so don't fetch value from m_pixelBuffer
4578  if ( areaToRight )
4579  newVal = area;
4580  else
4581  newVal = yBandHeight - area;
4582  } else {
4583  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= curX && curX < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4584  newVal = m_pixelBuffer[curX];
4585  if ( curX < m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand ) {
4586  // not the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND
4587  if ( areaToRight )
4588  newVal += area;
4589  else
4590  newVal -= area;
4591  } else {
4592  // the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND (which is NOT the top band)
4593  if ( areaToRight )
4594  newVal += area;
4595  else
4596  newVal += yBandHeight - area;
4597  }
4598  }
4599  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( -0.001 <= newVal && newVal <= 1.001 );
4600  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= curX && curX < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4601  m_pixelBuffer[curX] = newVal;
4602  ++curX;
4603  }
4604 
4605  // last pixel of (unclipped) segment (moving left to right, edge enters pixel left edge at x=curX and exits on the pixel's top or bottom at x=xmax)
4606  bool xmaxClipped = xMax < get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) || xMax >= get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds);
4607  if ( !xmaxClipped ) {
4608  tetraphilia_assert( curX == xMax );
4609  dx = real_services::Fraction( xmax );
4610  if ( dx != 0 ) {
4611 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4612  if ( edge->isConsideredLineForCurrentScanLine )
4613 #endif
4614  area = yBandHeight - dx * dx * real_services::DivideBy2(slope);
4615 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4616  else {
4617  // Remember that the actual x & y values are transposed in seg. Here we assert that the starting actual X value of the current seg is at least
4618  tetraphilia_assert( get_y(seg.controlPoint[0]) >= real_type(curX - ixmin) ); // && get_y(seg.controlPoint[3]) <= real_type(curX - ixmin + 1) );
4619  if ( get_y(seg.controlPoint[3]) > real_type(curX - ixmin + 1) ) {
4620  // should very rarely hit this code
4621  tetraphilia_assert_always(); // just checking to see when this is hit: CAN BE REMOVED
4622  InverseYOfBezierSegment( seg, real_type(curX - ixmin + 1), t2 );
4623  BezierSegment<point_type> pixelSeg;
4624  SplitOffLowTSideOfBezierSegmentAtTPinningCentralYValue( seg, pixelSeg, t2, real_type(curX - ixmin + 1) );
4625  seg = pixelSeg; // would be slightly more efficient to have another version of the above function to put the high-t part in 'seg', but don't expect this case to happen often
4626  }
4627  real_type integral;
4628  ComputeSignedAreaBetweenSegmentAndYAxis( seg, integral );
4629 
4630  real_type maxIntegral = dx * yBandHeight;
4631  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( -.002 <= integral && integral <= maxIntegral + .002 ); // .001 seemed to suffice in floating point builds
4632  if (integral < 0)
4633  integral = 0;
4634  else if ( integral > maxIntegral )
4635  integral = maxIntegral;
4636 
4637  if ( edgeSlopeIsNegative )
4638  area = yBandHeight - integral;
4639  else
4640  area = yBandHeight * (1 - dx) + integral;
4641  }
4642 #endif
4643  tetraphilia_assert( (0 <= area && area <= yBandHeight)
4644  || (0 <= yBandHeight - area && (yBandHeight - area <= yBandHeight * real_services::Fraction( xmax ) || (real_services::Fraction( xmax ) == 0 && area <= yBandHeight))) );
4645 
4646  if ( curX >= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop ) {
4647  // first time processing this pixel in this scanline so don't fetch value from m_pixelBuffer
4648  if ( areaToRight )
4649  newVal = area;
4650  else
4651  newVal = yBandHeight - area;
4652  } else {
4653  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= curX && curX < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4654  newVal = m_pixelBuffer[curX];
4655  if ( curX < m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand ) {
4656  // not the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND
4657  if ( areaToRight )
4658  newVal += area;
4659  else
4660  newVal -= area;
4661  } else {
4662  // the first time this pixel has been processed IN THIS BAND (which is NOT the top band)
4663  if ( areaToRight )
4664  newVal += area;
4665  else
4666  newVal += yBandHeight - area;
4667  }
4668  }
4669  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( -0.001 <= newVal && newVal <= 1.001 );
4670  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= curX && curX < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4671  m_pixelBuffer[curX] = newVal;
4672  }
4673  }
4674  }
4675 }
4676 
4677 // The purpose of this method is twofold. It needs to modify the segment list by changing
4678 // kOne and kZero segments to kPixel segments where necessary. Also, it needs to modify
4679 // the m_pixels[] data for (1) any pixel which gets converted to kPixels and
4680 // (2) any kPixels pixel which is inside the kOne region between the edges.
4681 template<typename app_traits>
4682 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::AdjustSegmentListWhenProcessingSecondaryBands( int_type leftXMin_int,
4683  int_type leftXMax_int,
4684  int_type rightXMin_int,
4685  int_type rightXMax_int,
4686  real_type yBandMin,
4687  real_type yBandMax )
4688 {
4689  tetraphilia_assert( leftXMin_int <= rightXMax_int );
4690  tetraphilia_assert( m_lastSegDataBlock != m_firstSegDataBlock ); // terminator kZero segment put in place at the end of the first band should preclude this
4691  tetraphilia_assert( m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop == limits<int_type>::max() ); // terminator kZero segment put in place at the end of the first band should preclude this
4692 
4693  // Assert that there are no 2 consecutive segments with the same type
4694  #ifndef NDEBUG
4695  {
4696  tetraphilia_assert( m_firstSegDataBlock != m_lastSegDataBlock );
4697  reducer_segment_data_type* prevSeg = t4::get_ptr( m_firstSegDataBlock->m_next ); // TODO: bkaskel: warning: prevSeg initially has NO TYPE??? because m_firstSegDataBlock currently has no type?
4698  reducer_segment_data_type* seg = t4::get_ptr( prevSeg->m_next );
4699  if ( prevSeg != t4::get_ptr( m_lastSegDataBlock ) ) {
4700  while ( 1 ) {
4701  tetraphilia_assert( seg && prevSeg );
4702  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segType != seg->m_segType ); // assert no repeated seg types
4703  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segStop < seg->m_segStop ); // assert no zero length segments
4704  if ( seg == t4::get_ptr( m_lastSegDataBlock ) )
4705  break;
4706  prevSeg = seg;
4707  seg = t4::get_ptr( seg->m_next );
4708  }
4709  }
4710  }
4711  #endif
4712 
4713  // We consider pixel ranges [A,B) to be empty if A >= B.
4714 
4715  // If leftXMax_int < rightXMin_int we process 4 ranges (any of which other than the ONE range could be empty):
4716  // ZERO: [ max(m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand, get_xmin(constraints)), leftXMin_int )
4717  // PIXELS: [ leftXMin_int, leftXMax_int)
4718  // ONE: [ leftXMax_int, rightXMin_int )
4719  // PIXELS: [ rightXMin_int, rightXMax_int )
4720 
4721  // If leftXMax_int >= rightXMin_int we process 2 ranges (either of which could be empty):
4722  // ZERO: [ max(m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand, get_xmin(constraints)), leftXMin_int )
4723  // PIXELS: [ leftXMin_int, rightXMax_int)
4724  int_type constraintsXMin = get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds);
4725  int_type constraintsXMax = get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds);
4726  int_type endOfLastSegment_pinned = (m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand < constraintsXMin) ? constraintsXMin : (m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand > constraintsXMax) ? constraintsXMax : m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand;
4727  int_type leftXMin_int_pinned = (leftXMin_int < constraintsXMin) ? constraintsXMin : (leftXMin_int > constraintsXMax) ? constraintsXMax : leftXMin_int;
4728  int_type leftXMax_int_pinned = (leftXMax_int < constraintsXMin) ? constraintsXMin : (leftXMax_int > constraintsXMax) ? constraintsXMax : leftXMax_int;
4729  int_type rightXMin_int_pinned = (rightXMin_int < constraintsXMin) ? constraintsXMin : (rightXMin_int > constraintsXMax) ? constraintsXMax : rightXMin_int;
4730  int_type rightXMax_int_pinned = (rightXMax_int < constraintsXMin) ? constraintsXMin : (rightXMax_int > constraintsXMax) ? constraintsXMax : rightXMax_int;
4731 
4732  int numRanges;
4733  ReducerSegmentType range_types[5];
4734  int_type rangeBoundary[5];
4735  rangeBoundary[0] = endOfLastSegment_pinned;
4736  if ( leftXMin_int_pinned > rangeBoundary[0] ) {
4737  range_types[1] = kZero;
4738  numRanges = 1;
4739  } else {
4740  numRanges = 0;
4741  }
4742  rangeBoundary[numRanges] = leftXMin_int_pinned;
4743 
4744  if ( leftXMax_int_pinned < rightXMin_int_pinned ) {
4745  if ( leftXMin_int_pinned < leftXMax_int_pinned ) {
4746  // PIXELS range
4747  rangeBoundary[++numRanges] = leftXMax_int_pinned;
4748  range_types[numRanges] = kPixels;
4749  }
4750 
4751  // ONE range
4752  rangeBoundary[++numRanges] = rightXMin_int_pinned;
4753  range_types[numRanges] = kOne;
4754 
4755  if ( rightXMin_int_pinned < rightXMax_int_pinned ) {
4756  // PIXELS range
4757  rangeBoundary[++numRanges] = rightXMax_int_pinned;
4758  range_types[numRanges] = kPixels;
4759  }
4760  } else if ( leftXMin_int_pinned < rightXMax_int_pinned ) {
4761  // PIXELS range
4762  rangeBoundary[++numRanges] = rightXMax_int_pinned;
4763  range_types[numRanges] = kPixels;
4764  }
4765 
4766  if (!numRanges)
4767  return;
4768 
4769  const real_type fracOfYBandMin = real_services::Fraction( yBandMin );
4770  const real_type yBandHeight = yBandMax - yBandMin;
4771  bool mightNeedToConsolidateSegments = false;
4772 
4773  auto prevSeg = m_firstSegDataBlock;
4774  auto seg = prevSeg->m_next;
4775  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg != m_lastSegDataBlock && seg ); // since we put a kZero terminator at the end of the list when we finished processing the first band
4776  // advance past any segments before the start of the first range we will process
4777  tetraphilia_assert( numRanges > 0 );
4778  while ( seg->m_segStop <= rangeBoundary[0] ) {
4779  prevSeg = seg;
4780  seg = seg->m_next;
4781  }
4782 
4783  int_type range_left = rangeBoundary[0];
4784  int_type range_right = rangeBoundary[1];
4785  ReducerSegmentType range_type = range_types[1];
4786  int i = 1; // 1-based range index
4787  while (1) {
4788  // assert seg and range intersect
4789  tetraphilia_assert( range_left < range_right && prevSeg->m_segStop < seg->m_segStop && range_left < seg->m_segStop && range_right > prevSeg->m_segStop );
4790 
4791  ReducerSegmentType newSegType = (seg->m_segType == range_type) ? seg->m_segType : kPixels;
4792  auto intersection_right = t4::min<int_type>( seg->m_segStop, range_right ); // first pixel to the right of the pixels we are processing in this iteration
4793  bool changeSegType = newSegType != seg->m_segType;
4794  bool advanceRangeAfterCurrentIteration = (range_right <= seg->m_segStop);
4795 
4796  // if we're changing the segtype, we may need to break seg into pieces
4797  if ( changeSegType ) {
4798  int change = 0;
4799  if ( prevSeg->m_segStop < range_left ) {
4800  // split seg at range_left and end up with prevSeg to be left half of seg at this point and seg to be right helf of seg at this point
4801  auto leftHalfOfSeg = GetNewLooseSegmentDataBlock();
4802  leftHalfOfSeg->m_segStop = range_left;
4803  leftHalfOfSeg->m_segType = seg->m_segType;
4804  leftHalfOfSeg->m_next = seg;
4805  prevSeg->m_next = leftHalfOfSeg;
4806  prevSeg = std::move( leftHalfOfSeg );
4807  ++change;
4808  // we adjust the seg->m_segType later, see below
4809  }
4810  if ( seg->m_segStop > range_right ) {
4811  // split seg at range_right and end up with seg to be left half of seg at this point
4812  auto leftHalfOfSeg = GetNewLooseSegmentDataBlock();
4813  leftHalfOfSeg->m_segStop = range_right;
4814  leftHalfOfSeg->m_segType = seg->m_segType;
4815  leftHalfOfSeg->m_next = seg;
4816  seg = leftHalfOfSeg;
4817  prevSeg->m_next = std::move( leftHalfOfSeg );
4818  mightNeedToConsolidateSegments = true;
4819  ++change;
4820  // we adjust the seg->m_segType later, see below
4821  }
4822  mightNeedToConsolidateSegments = mightNeedToConsolidateSegments || (change != 2);
4823  }
4824 
4825  // Process m_pixels if necessary for seg & range.
4826  // The cases where we need to modify values of m_pixels[...] are as follows:
4827  // seg:kZero range:kPixels Must set all intersecting m_pixels values to zero.
4828  // seg:kZero range:kOne Must set all intersecting m_pixels values to yBandHeight.
4829  // seg:kPixels range:kOne Must ADD yBandHeight to all intersecting m_pixels values.
4830  // seg:kOne range:kZero or kPixels Must set all intersecting m_pixels values to fracOfYBandMin.
4831  tetraphilia_assert( kZero == 0 && kOne == 1 && kPixels == 2 );
4832  int op = 0; // NOP = 0; SET = 1; ADD = 2;
4833  real_type val = 0; // doesn't strictly need to be initialized, but this initialization removes some compiler warnings
4834  if ( seg->m_segType == kZero ) {
4835  if ( range_type == kPixels ) {
4836  op = 1;
4837  val = 0;
4838  } else if ( range_type == kOne ) {
4839  op = 1;
4840  val = yBandHeight;
4841  }
4842  } else if ( seg->m_segType == kOne ) {
4843  if ( range_type != kOne ) {
4844  op = 1;
4845  val = fracOfYBandMin;
4846  }
4847  } else {
4848  tetraphilia_assert( seg->m_segType == kPixels );
4849  if ( range_type == kOne ) {
4850  op = 2;
4851  val = yBandHeight;
4852  }
4853  }
4854 
4855  // now we adjust seg->m_segType
4856  seg->m_segType = newSegType;
4857 
4858  if (op) {
4859  auto L = t4::max<int_type>( prevSeg->m_segStop, range_left );
4860  auto R = t4::min<int_type>( intersection_right, get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4861  tetraphilia_assert( L < R ); // should be processing at least one pixel
4862  if ( op == 1 ) {
4863  for ( ;L < R; ++L ) {
4864  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= L && L < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4865  m_pixelBuffer[L] = val;
4866  }
4867  } else {
4868  tetraphilia_assert( op == 2 );
4869  for ( ;L < R; ++L ) {
4870  tetraphilia_assert( get_xmin(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) <= L && L < get_xmax(m_constraints.m_interestBounds) );
4871  m_pixelBuffer[L] += val;
4872  }
4873  }
4874  }
4875 
4876  if ( advanceRangeAfterCurrentIteration ) {
4877  if ( i == numRanges )
4878  break;
4879  range_left = range_right;
4880  range_right = rangeBoundary[++i];
4881  range_type = range_types[i];
4882  }
4883 
4884  tetraphilia_assert( (prevSeg->m_segStop <= intersection_right && intersection_right < seg->m_segStop) || intersection_right == seg->m_segStop );
4885  // only advance segment if it doesn't contain intersection_right
4886  if ( intersection_right >= seg->m_segStop ) {
4887  // advance seg
4888  prevSeg = seg;
4889  seg = seg->m_next;
4890  }
4891  tetraphilia_assert( (prevSeg->m_segStop <= intersection_right && intersection_right < seg->m_segStop) );
4892  }
4893 
4894  // Consolidate any adjacent segments of the same type
4895  tetraphilia_assert( m_firstSegDataBlock != m_lastSegDataBlock );
4896  if ( mightNeedToConsolidateSegments ) {
4897  tetraphilia_assert( m_firstSegDataBlock->m_next != m_lastSegDataBlock ); // since mightNeedToConsolidateSegments implies we split at least one segment and we know we started off with at least 2 because of the terminator
4898  prevSeg = m_firstSegDataBlock->m_next;
4899  seg = prevSeg->m_next;
4900  while ( prevSeg != m_lastSegDataBlock ) {
4901  if ( prevSeg->m_segType == seg->m_segType ) {
4902  // remove seg from list
4903  prevSeg->m_segStop = seg->m_segStop;
4904  if ( seg == m_lastSegDataBlock ) {
4905  m_lastSegDataBlock = prevSeg;
4906  } else {
4907  prevSeg->m_next = seg->m_next;
4908  seg->m_next = m_lastSegDataBlock->m_next;
4909  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_next = seg;
4910  seg = prevSeg->m_next;
4911  }
4912  } else {
4913  prevSeg = seg;
4914  seg = seg->m_next;
4915  }
4916  }
4917  }
4918 
4919  // Assert that there are no 2 consecutive segments with the same type
4920  #ifndef NDEBUG
4921  {
4922  tetraphilia_assert( m_firstSegDataBlock != m_lastSegDataBlock );
4923  prevSeg = m_firstSegDataBlock->m_next; // TODO: bkaskel: warning: prevSeg initially has NO TYPE??? because m_firstSegDataBlock currently has no type?
4924  seg = prevSeg->m_next;
4925  if ( prevSeg != m_lastSegDataBlock ) {
4926  while ( 1 ) {
4927  tetraphilia_assert( seg && prevSeg );
4928  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segType != seg->m_segType ); // assert no repeated seg types
4929  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segStop < seg->m_segStop ); // assert no zero length segments
4930  if ( seg == m_lastSegDataBlock )
4931  break;
4932  prevSeg = seg;
4933  seg = seg->m_next;
4934  }
4935  }
4936  }
4937  #endif
4938 }
4939 
4940 template<typename app_traits>
4941 void bezier_sampler<app_traits>::AddTrans( edge_type* leftEdge, edge_type* rightEdge,
4942  real_type yBandMin, real_type yBandMax,
4943  bool firstBandInScanLine )
4944 {
4945  int_type leftXMin_int, leftXMax_int, rightXMin_int, rightXMax_int;
4946  real_type leftXMin_real, leftXMax_real, rightXMin_real, rightXMax_real;
4947  GetMinMaxVals( leftXMin_real, leftXMax_real, leftEdge );
4948  GetMinMaxVals( rightXMin_real, rightXMax_real, rightEdge );
4949 
4950  tetraphilia_assert( leftXMin_real <= leftXMax_real );
4951  tetraphilia_assert( rightXMin_real <= rightXMax_real );
4952  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( leftXMin_real <= rightXMin_real + .1 ); // this can hit when quasi-horizontal lines are in the mix
4953  tetraphilia_reducer_precision_assert( leftXMax_real <= rightXMax_real + .1 ); // this can hit when quasi-horizontal lines are in the mix
4954 
4955  // CONSTRAIN RIGHT EDGE VALUES TO BE TO THE RIGHT OF THE LEFT EDGE VALUES
4956  if ( rightXMin_real < leftXMin_real )
4957  rightXMin_real = leftXMin_real;
4958  if ( rightXMax_real < leftXMax_real )
4959  rightXMax_real = leftXMax_real;
4960  tetraphilia_assert( leftXMin_real <= leftXMax_real );
4961  tetraphilia_assert( rightXMin_real <= rightXMax_real );
4962 
4963  leftXMin_int = real_services::FloorToInt( ArgType<int_type>(), leftXMin_real );
4964  rightXMin_int = real_services::FloorToInt( ArgType<int_type>(), rightXMin_real );
4965  leftXMax_int = real_services::CeilToInt( ArgType<int_type>(), leftXMax_real );
4966  rightXMax_int = real_services::CeilToInt( ArgType<int_type>(), rightXMax_real );
4967 
4968  #ifndef NDEBUG
4969  {
4970  auto prevSeg = m_firstSegDataBlock->m_next;
4971  if ( m_firstSegDataBlock != m_lastSegDataBlock && prevSeg != m_lastSegDataBlock ) {
4972  auto seg = prevSeg->m_next;
4973  while ( 1 ) {
4974  tetraphilia_assert( seg && prevSeg );
4975  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segType != seg->m_segType ); // assert no repeated seg types
4976  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segStop < seg->m_segStop ); // assert no zero length segments
4977  if ( seg == m_lastSegDataBlock )
4978  break;
4979  prevSeg = seg;
4980  seg = seg->m_next;
4981  }
4982  }
4983  }
4984  #endif
4985 
4986  if ( !firstBandInScanLine )
4987  AdjustSegmentListWhenProcessingSecondaryBands( leftXMin_int, leftXMax_int, rightXMin_int, rightXMax_int, yBandMin, yBandMax );
4988 
4989  FillPixels( leftXMin_real,
4990  leftXMin_int,
4991  leftXMax_real,
4992  leftXMax_int,
4993 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
4994  leftEdge,
4995 #endif
4996  yBandMin, yBandMax, true/*areaToRight*/ );
4997 
4998  if ( firstBandInScanLine ) {
4999  bool overlapsPrevious = m_lastSegDataBlock != m_firstSegDataBlock // not the first pair of edges for this scanline
5000  && leftXMin_int <= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop;
5001 
5002  if ( !overlapsPrevious ) {
5003  // account for zeros between previous fill region and current fill region
5004  tetraphilia_assert( leftXMin_int >= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop );
5005  if ( m_lastSegDataBlock == m_firstSegDataBlock || m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType != kZero ) {
5006  m_lastSegDataBlock = NewSegmentDataBlock();
5007  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType = kZero;
5008  }
5009  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = leftXMin_int;
5010 
5011  // set up kPixels segment for left edge if not vertical or not on pixel boundary
5012  if ( leftXMax_int > leftXMin_int ) {
5013  m_lastSegDataBlock = NewSegmentDataBlock();
5014  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType = kPixels;
5015  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = leftXMax_int;
5016  }
5017  } else {
5018  // overlapped with previous, i.e., leftMin_int <= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop
5019 
5020  // if left edge extends past end of last segment, make sure final segment is kPixels and extend it to the end of the left edge
5021  if ( leftXMax_int > m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop ) {
5022  if ( m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType == kPixels )
5023  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = leftXMax_int;
5024  else {
5025  tetraphilia_assert( leftXMax_int > leftXMin_int ); // since leftMin_int <= m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop < leftMax_int
5026  m_lastSegDataBlock = NewSegmentDataBlock();
5027  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType = kPixels;
5028  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = leftXMax_int;
5029  }
5030  }
5031  }
5032  }
5033 
5034  // update m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand before calling FillPixels for right edge
5035  if ( leftXMax_int > m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand )
5036  m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand = leftXMax_int;
5037 
5038  FillPixels( rightXMin_real,
5039  rightXMin_int,
5040  rightXMax_real,
5041  rightXMax_int,
5042 #ifdef COMPUTE_PRECISE_AREAS
5043  rightEdge,
5044 #endif
5045  yBandMin, yBandMax, false/*areaToRight*/ );
5046 
5047  if ( firstBandInScanLine ) {
5048  // are there any One pixels between the right and left edges?
5049  if ( rightXMin_int > leftXMax_int ) {
5050  // test for very rare case which can sometimes occur due to imprecision in our computations
5051  if ( m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop > leftXMax_int ) {
5052  // back up segment list so that the last segment has m_segStop == leftXMax_int
5053  auto tmpSeg = m_firstSegDataBlock;
5054  while ( tmpSeg->m_segStop < leftXMax_int )
5055  tmpSeg = tmpSeg->m_next;
5056  // here segment tmpSeg contains the pixel with index (leftXMax_int-1) so setting its stop to leftXMax_int will not create a zero length segment
5057  tetraphilia_assert( tmpSeg == m_lastSegDataBlock || tmpSeg->m_next == m_lastSegDataBlock ); // don't believe we can have more than one extra segment at the end at this point
5058  tmpSeg->m_segStop = leftXMax_int;
5059  m_lastSegDataBlock = tmpSeg; // most if not all cases when we hit this point, m_lastSegDataBlock is probably already equal to this value, but set it here anyway to be safe
5060  }
5061  if ( m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType != kOne ) {
5062 
5063  m_lastSegDataBlock = NewSegmentDataBlock();
5064  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType = kOne;
5065  }
5066  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = rightXMin_int;
5067  if ( rightXMax_int > rightXMin_int ) {
5068  m_lastSegDataBlock = NewSegmentDataBlock();
5069  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType = kPixels;
5070  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = rightXMax_int;
5071  }
5072  } else {
5073  if ( rightXMax_int > leftXMin_int ) {
5074  // we're NOT in the rare case where the left and right edges overlap, are vertical and are on a scanline boundary
5075 
5076  if ( m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType != kPixels ) {
5077  // in for example, the "|\" case where the left edge is along a vertical scanline boundary and the right edge is diagonal
5078  m_lastSegDataBlock = NewSegmentDataBlock();
5079  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segType = kPixels;
5080  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = rightXMax_int;
5081  }
5082  else if ( rightXMax_int > m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop )
5083  m_lastSegDataBlock->m_segStop = rightXMax_int;
5084  }
5085  }
5086  }
5087 
5088  if ( rightXMax_int > m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand )
5089  m_endOfLastSegmentProcessedInCurrentBand = rightXMax_int;
5090 
5091  #ifndef NDEBUG
5092  {
5093  auto prevSeg = m_firstSegDataBlock->m_next;
5094  if ( m_firstSegDataBlock != m_lastSegDataBlock && prevSeg != m_lastSegDataBlock ) {
5095  auto seg = prevSeg->m_next;
5096  while ( 1 ) {
5097  tetraphilia_assert( seg && prevSeg );
5098  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segType != seg->m_segType ); // assert no repeated seg types
5099  tetraphilia_assert( prevSeg->m_segStop < seg->m_segStop ); // assert no zero length segments
5100  if ( seg == m_lastSegDataBlock )
5101  break;
5102  prevSeg = seg;
5103  seg = seg->m_next;
5104  }
5105  }
5106  }
5107  #endif
5108 }
5109 
5110 } // end namespace imaging_model
5111 } // end namespace tetraphilia
5112 
5113 #endif /* TETRAPHILIA_IMAGINGMODEL_BEZIER_REDUCER_HPP_ */
